text: Juan Jose Gutierrez Bermudez (born 2 August 2001) is a Mexican Paralympic swimmer. He competed at the 2020 Summer Paralympics. He competed at the 2019 Parapan American Games, winning a bronze medal. == References == == Other websites == * Juan Jose Gutierrez Bermudez of Team Mexico competes in the Menâ€™s photo by Lintao Zhang - Getty Images Category:2001 births Category:Swimmers Category:Living people
